summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganShape and hold hair styled with curling irons, hot rollers, and flat irons with Kenra Thermal Styling Spray 19. This non-sticking thermal protecting spray prevents hair damage by permitting a clean release from styling tools.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides firm hold & styling control for hot tool usageThermal protection up to 428 degreesNon-sticking formula for clean styling tool releaseTames frizz, flyaways & adds shineItem 2084029How To UseFor creating straight or curly styles, spray a section of dry hair liberally and apply heated styling tool. Repeat section by section until desired style is achieved. Then, spray over entire style, holding bottle 8-10 inches away.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Alcohol Denat., Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Va/Crotonates/Vinyl Neodecanoate Copolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Hexamethyldisiloxane, Parfum/Fragrance, Benzophenone-3, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Benzoate, Geraniol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: For creating straight or curly styles, spray a section of dry hair liberally and apply heated styling tool. Repeat section by section until desired style is achieved. Then, spray over entire style, holding bottle 8-10 inches away.

reviews.headline: The revised formula is not effective without a firm hold!!
reviews.comments: The revised formula has ZERO hold! This is the worst styling spray! I have been using this thermal spray for years and now I had to find something else! I'm so disappointed!

reviews.headline: Burned my hair off!
reviews.comments: I take very good care of my hair and have used hot tools  for decades. My hair is in very good condition  I wanted to go to only ising a leave in conditioner when drying and a light styling productwith heat protection. I used this the first time and it was good. No issues. I used it the next day, following the same process: no over spaying, let it dry, I combed it through hair when I sprayed it and when it was dry. I did my first curl with the curling iron, and everything on that iron immediately burned ,stuck to the iron and came off. HUGE chunk of hair gone! Right around my face. There was no wet spot, nothing should have caused this. I have never had this happen to me. I searched reviews,  and I am not the first to experience this. Stay away if you like your hair. So mad!!!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Great product

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Easy to use and doesn't take much product.  One bottle lasts a long time.

reviews.headline: Kenra professional thermal styling spray
reviews.comments: This thermal styling spray provides my fine long hair with heat protection and hold.  It  is not heavy on my fine hair but does give it some hold when I use if with my hot styling tools.  This has saved my white hair from burning and turning color when I use my hot styling tools.

reviews.headline: Do not recommend
reviews.comments: This product did not work on my fine, straight hair. I got no lift or shine.

reviews.headline: Get it!
reviews.comments: I put this on my hair and did some wand curls for my birthday on 26inch bundles and leave out…… and went to get my groove on out on the dance floor. When I came home, my hair looked just as good as it did when I got home!!

reviews.headline: Would definetly buy again!
reviews.comments: First time trying the product and i loved it!

reviews.headline: I love Kenra Thermal 19 and I've used it for a few years.
reviews.comments: I've used #19 for a few years.  It provides excellent heat protection and I also use it as a finishing/ holding spray.

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: I saw this on a hairstylists youtube video talking about how it is the absolute best thing to use, and I was a little wary because I have used it before and thought I hated it. I was just using it way WRONG!!! The key is to spray, and start brushing right away to blend in. Let dry a little bit, and then start curling or styling. I have never gotten such a perfect clean release from my curling iron, and it adds shine and incredible hold. You dont even have to spray the curl again after release or use a finishing spray. This is a hairspray and heat protecant so I think some of the bad reviews are due to user error like my first time trying it. I will never stop repurchasing this. It lasts me a long time for how often I curl my hair so I think the price point is great. I feel like this gets most of the credit on keeping my curls for days. I never used to be able to get a curl to hold no matter what I did, but right when I started using this spray I have curls for days. Give it a try! I know its sticky at first, but brush out and trust the process and it turns out perfect.

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: I saw this on a hairstylists youtube video talking about how it is the absolute best thing to use, and I was a little wary because I have used it before and thought I hated it. I was just using it way WRONG!!! The key is to spray, and start brushing right away to blend in. Let dry a little bit, and then start curling or styling. I have never gotten such a perfect clean release from my curling iron, and it adds shine and incredible hold. You dont even have to spray the curl again after release or use a finishing spray. This is a hairspray and heat protecant so I think some of the bad reviews are due to user error like my first time trying it. I will never stop repurchasing this. It lasts me a long time for how often I curl my hair so I think the price point is great. I feel like this gets most of the credit on keeping my curls for days. I never used to be able to get a curl to hold no matter what I did, but right when I started using this spray I have curls for days. Give it a try! I know its sticky at first, but brush out and trust the process and it turns out perfect.

reviews.headline: I've been buying this product for years.
reviews.comments: It seems to protect my hair as I have to straighten it!

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: I was so excited about this product but it was a huge disappointment. This stuff is super sticky/tacky upon spraying which I thought wouldn't be an issue after styling- I was wrong. After styling, my hair was dry and crunchy which resulted in sooooo many tangles. I have thick hair that usually doesn't tangle easily so this was super frustrating. I would run my fingers through my hair every 5 minutes and find a ton of new tangles when all I was doing was sitting at the dinner table talking to friends. And lastly, I didn't feel that it held my curls any better than normal hairspray.

reviews.headline: just wanted a thermal spray
reviews.comments: Really disappointed in this product.  Made hair very dry.  Too pricey for it not to work.

reviews.headline: On my favorites list!
reviews.comments: This is the best thing to hold a curl. Will purchase again.

reviews.headline: Works great and scent is not overwhelming
reviews.comments: This product works great for me.  My hair is very straight and fine.  Using this product on dry hair before using a curling iron, Calista, makes it possible for my hair to curl enough to hold a body wave.   I also sometimes apply it to my hair wet or dry hair without using a curling iron to give lift and body to my hair.  The best feature I love about many many Kendra products is that the scent is light and not obnoxiously smelling.  I am sensitive to many scented products and can't use them without getting a stomachache.  This product's light scent doesn't bother me.

reviews.headline: Hated it!  Waste of my money
reviews.comments: Wish I had followed my instinct and not purchased this product!  I swear that my hair broke during styling, my bangs seem to be a little shorter than they were when I started!!  The product feels like hairspray, and is very sticky.

reviews.headline: Finally something that holds my Dyson Airwrap curls!
reviews.comments: I've been trying for over a year to find a product that will hold my Dyson Airwrap curls! I spray a wet heat protectant (cheap Tressemme red and black bottle), then the Kenra 19 on each inch section of hair, then brush it through over and over to make sure it doesn't get crunchy, and it's spreads evenly! Then I hold the Airwrap upside down and use it like a wand. My curls are lasting for days!  If you don't brush this stuff through, it does get hard and feels gross!

reviews.headline: Would never buy again
reviews.comments: Left hair very dry after one use.

reviews.headline: I have used this product for years
reviews.comments: Very light spray, holds but not stiff

media.headline: Awful on my hair.  Like hairspray very drying. Tangled bad.
media.caption: Did not hold curl.

media.headline: Awful on my hair.  Like hairspray very drying. Tangled bad.
media.caption: Very dry feeling. Tangled.

media.headline: Finally a product that keeps my curls in place
Finally a product that keeps my curls in place

faceoff_positive.comments: Use this before straightening and curling.  Helps hair take and hold style.  Slightly tacky so spray, brush through, then style.  Used Redken Spray Starch previously, but when could no longer find at Ulta the clerk suggested this as a replacement that would be better for the health of hair.  I would agree with that.  This product turned me onto Kenra and I've used several other products which I've been very happy with including the Platinum blow dry spray and especially the platinum silkening mist.  Going to try the hairspray next.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great styling tool

faceoff_negative.comments: I love Kenra products. I love the blow dry spray, silkening mist and shanpoos/conditioner. I bought the thermal styling spray to protect my hair from heat when I am not using the blow dry spray and it is AWFUL. It felt like I was spraying liquid tar in my hair. My hair felt sticky and greasy. I would not recommend this and will be returning it.
faceoff_negative.headline: So Disappointed
